name: Anti Armor Ammunition
desc: Special ammunition, increasing hit strength for armor damage reduction calculation of all weapons by %s.

name: Bombardment Package
desc: Package for precision orbital bombardment. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull size, up to the total number of marines in the fleet, it also reduces bombarment cost for the same amount.

name: Emergency Venting System
desc: Modify flux network by attaching one-use capacity cells to the network. When ship reaches %s of its capacity, %s of its hard flux and %s of its soft flux is vented in span of %s seconds. Amount of charges is limited %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. With each cell used, max capacity gets lowered by %s of its current value for duration of the battle.

name: Exploration Refit
desc:
A modification used by deep space exploration fleets, replaces parts of the ship militarized subsystems with ones that increases overall exploration performance.
Reduces fuel usage by %s, supplie use for maintenance by %s and increases sensor strength by %s.
Reduces maximum combat readiness by %s. And reduces combat readiness recovery rate by %s.
All effects reduced by %s if Efficiency Overhaul is installed.

name: Flux Booster
desc: Increases venting speed by %s (redused by %s if Resistant Flux Conduits is installed). While venting increases speed and maneuverability by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on the hull size and flux level at moment of venting start, for %s seconds or until ship stops venting.

name: Flux Overdrive
desc: Increase weapon rate of fire as flux level rise up to %s at max flux.

name: Fuel Additive
desc: Special additive for anti-material fuel increase its efficiency. Reduces fuel consumption by %s and increase maximum burn by %s. But makes engine unstable and increase maintenance by %s.

name: Hyper Engine Upgrade
desc:
Redirect ship systems while at zero flux to increase ship speed, slower ships get greater effect. 
Reduces maneuverability while zero flux boost active by %s.
Speed boost is: %s
Not compatible with Safety Overrides.

name: Integrated Armor
desc: Provide %s of armor value for damage reduction even after armor been stripped up to %s/%s/%s/%s armor points, depending on hull size.

name: Particle Accelerator
desc: Supercharge weapons, increases projectile travel speed by %s.

name: Torpedo Spec
desc: Modify missiles propulsion system to be forward focused, increasing their speed by %s and hitpoints by %s, at the cost of reducing their maneuverability by %s.

name: Unstable Shields
desc: Overcharges shield projectors with energy, reducing shield damage taken by %s for %s seconds after it was deployed. Subsequently, shield starts taking more damage, up to maximum of %s after being deployed for %s seconds. Shield efficiency returns to charged state after shield was disabled for %s seconds

name: Voltage Regulation System
desc:
Reduces beam weapons flux cost by %s.
Reduces beam weapon range by %s.

name: Weapon Inhibitor
desc:
Reduces ballistic weapon flux generated by %s.
Reduces ballistic weapon rate of fire by %s.
